nodes.text: Darian Gli was a Markul member of Jabba Desilijic Tiure's court who was secretly in league with Lady Valarian. He helped Beshka University professors Ra Yasht and Skarten get an interview with Jabba's cook, Porcellus, which they turned into the book Torture Observed: An Interview with Jabba's Cook. For this offense, Jabba consumed him. Melvosh Bloor had set up a meeting between himself and Gli, only to find out later that Gli was already dead.
